message: In your cell block, you meet a notorious gang leader who's orchestrating a prison break.

options.message: The gang leader evaluates you carefully.
You decide to watch and wait.

message: Days pass as you observe the prison routine. Guards seem lax during shift changes.

options.message: You decide to use the guard shift change to your advantage.
Perhaps working with the gang is the better option.

message: The gang leader shares his elaborate escape plan involving the prison's sewer system.

options.message: Time to put the plan into action.

message: You prepare for your escape attempt during the next guard shift change.

options.message: You begin your carefully timed escape.

message: You've successfully escaped. Freedom awaits in the city.

options.message: You make your way to a nearby tavern to gather information.
